pages.text: The $(mob)Ancient Golem$() is a monster that spawns in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$() and sometimes in $(thing)Ruins$(). It attacks nearby players on sight, slowly approaching them to attack in melee while firing energy projectiles that travel in a straight line. It is immune to knockback.
$(mob)Ancient Golems$() drop $(item)Archaic Bricks$() on death. They are primarly used to make various decorative blocks.

$(mob)Ancient Golems$() can also drop an $(item)Ancient Motive Core$() on death. It can be crafted into an $(item)Ancient Codex$() which contains essential information on how to find and use $(thing)Ember$().
